title: Disney: The Market Is Finally Waking Up To The Danger Of The YouTube TV Blackout
snippet: The Walt Disney Company stock fell nearly 10% after its FY2025 report, driven by concerns over the ongoing YouTube TV blackout dispute. The earnings report itself was solid, with steady free cash flow and improved net income, but transparency around ESPN's ...

title: 3 Years After Gear 5, One Piece Finally Confirms Luffy's Next Power Up
snippet: Rei is an Editor for GameRant's Evergreen and Features teams from Kashmir, situated in Beirut. He's an avid fan of anime, manga, and gaming. He is the author of some of the articles here that you liked, and others that you didn't. When he isn't writing, he ...
content: 3 Years After Gear 5, One Piece Finally Confirms Luffy's Next Power Up Menu Sign in now Close Game News Platforms Submenu PlayStation Xbox Nintendo PC Games Mobile GR Originals Submenu Opinions Game Reviews Features Game Rant Advance Game Guides Maps Videos Submenu Originals Game Trailers Anime Submenu News Features More Submenu Movies & TV Lists Giveaways Sign in Newsletter Menu Follow Followed Like Threads 3 More Action Summary Generate a summary of this story Sign in now Fallout 76: Burning Springs (Game Rant Advance) Where Winds Meet Black Ops 7 Arc Raiders Battlefield 6 Coming Soon Close 3 Years After Gear 5, One Piece Finally Confirms Luffy's Next Power Up By Rei Penber Published Nov 8, 2025 Rei is an Editor for GameRant's Evergreen and Features teams from Kashmir, situated in Beirut. He's an avid fan of anime, manga, and gaming. He is the author of some of the articles here that you liked, and others that you didn't. When he isn't writing, he often re-reads One Piece, and replays his favorite games. Sign in to your Game Rant account Summary Generate a summary of this story follow Follow followed Followed Like Like Thread 3 Log in Here is a fact-based summary of the story contents: Try something different: Show me the facts Explain it like I’m 5 Give me a lighthearted recap This article contains spoilers from One Piece's Elbaf Arc. One Piece is currently in the Elbaf arc and fans are getting to see some of the biggest reveals one after another here. From lore to some of the biggest battles of the past, the Loki flashback has shown it all to the fans. Through this incredible stretch of chapters that the fans have received as of late, Oda has also made it clear that he has bigger power-ups planned for the protagonist of the series, Monkey D. Luffy . Related One Piece's Gol D. Roger Has Been Dethroned By A New Pirate Roger is strong, but he can't solo this One Piece character. Posts 2 By Rei Penber Nov 6, 2025 As most fans are well aware, it's been quite a while since Luffy got his last power-up in the story. At the moment, Luffy's biggest and most recent power-up is Gear 5, and it is with the help of this incredible ability that he was able to finally topple Kaido, the King of Beasts. The final saga of One Piece has brought in newer enemies, however, and Gear 5 is no longer enough. It was apparent to the fans that Luffy needed new power-ups if he was to face off and win against characters like Imu, and Oda has finally addressed that by showing the fans exactly what power-up Luffy will gain next. Years after Gear 5, Oda had now officially lined up Luffy's upcoming new power . Luffy Will Gain Advanced Haki In The Final Saga Rocks Showed New Haki Abilities In God Valley Luffy Needs To Learn Haki Barrier And Haki Blasts Luffy's Haki Needs To Improve When it comes to Devil Fruit abilities, Luffy has already done the most he can. Devil Fruit Awakening is the pinnacle of a Devil Fruit's powers and Luffy expressed this himself in the Wano Country Arc. Upon awakening his Devil Fruit, Luffy clearly stated that he was now at his peak, and this naturally referred to his Devil Fruit powers. What is this feeling? I feel like I can do anything! This is my peak... This is Gear 5! — Luffy in One Piece chapter 1044 Luffy can't get more out of his Devil Fruit and that's clear, but he can still grow in terms of Haki, and Scopper Gaban clearly told Luffy that he needs to be mindful of how he uses his Haki. Luffy's next power-up is coming in the Haki department . Related After 15 Years, One Piece Finally Introduces A New Haki Power Haki is king, and Oda just revealed a brand new Haki ability in One Piece. Posts 13 By Rei Penber Nov 6, 2025 In One Piece chapter 1165, Oda showcased Rocks D. Xebec using a very unique power, and that's the ability to use high-level Conqueror's Haki as a barrier . Essentially, Rocks's Haki was so strong that it automatically nullified every attack launched at him. It almost acted like a barrier between him and the e

title: Waking Up with Wesley: Fog tomorrow, rain by week's end, and a big freeze could come next week (10/5/25)
snippet: It’s going to be fairly mild this evening, but temperatures will drop into the mid to upper 50s by Sunday morning. A stray shower or two will be possible. An approaching cold front may bring a few showers on Sunday, but many of us will remain dry.
content: Waking Up with Wesley: Fog tomorrow, rain by week's end, and a big freeze could come next week (10/5/25) Skip to content News Watch Live Video Weather Sports Gulf Coast Weekend We the People TV Listings About Us Home Watch Live Upload Your Photos Event Calendar Gas Prices Be Local WLOX Careers Deals and Contests South Mississippi Mental Health Resources For Your Service Expert Alert Coats for Kids Toys for Tots Shopping Spree Santa Did My Roof Elfie Contest News National InvestigateTV The 4 O'Clock Show Good Morning Mississippi Good News News This Week We the People Fatal Dose WLOX News App Submit a Story Idea Newsletter Signup Sports Sports Video Scoreboard Friday Night Football Showdown Scholar Athlete Biloxi Shuckers Watch the Pelicans Watch the Braves About Us Contact Us Creative Services Apps Contests WLOX History Weather Weather Blog Radar Severe Weather Alerts River Forecasts Weather Art Closings Hurricane Center WLOX First Alert Weather App Request a Visit Election Results Programming Schedule Telemundo Biloxi NextGen TV Zeam - News Streams Circle Country InvestigateTV Watching Your Wallet PowerNation Gray DC Bureau Digital Marketing Gray AI Policy Waking Up with Wesley: Fog tomorrow, rain by week's end, and a big freeze could come next week (10/5/25) Updated : Nov. 5, 2025 at 8:35 AM CST Email This Link Share on Facebook Share on X (formerly Twitter) Share on Pinterest Share on LinkedIn Senior Meteorologist Wesley Williams says the weather pattern into the rest of the week will trend milder with fog possible tomorrow. Weather Waking Up with Wesley: Winter weather today, wind chills in the 40s (12/2/25) Updated : 3 hours ago | Senior Meteorologist Wesley Williams has a look at Tuesday's wind chills, in the 40s all day. Plus, when will we see less clouds and more sunshine? Forecast Wesley's Tuesday First Alert Forecast Updated : 5 hours ago | Where's your sweater? Where's your winter coat? It's going to feel like the 40s all day due to breezy, cloudy, & cooler conditions. Click and watch the forecast video for details. Forecast Taylor's Tuesday Midday First Alert Forecast Updated : 6 hours ago | It’s feeling like December today! The rest of the afternoon will be chilly and breezy with winds from the northwest. If we see more sunshine, we’ll manage to reach the mid 50s. The sky will clear out overnight tonight, and temperatures will drop into the low to mid 30s by Wednesday morning. People, pets, and plants will need to be protected. Wednesday will be dry, but we'll likely have more rain by Thursday and Friday. Forecast Wesley's Tuesday Morning First Alert Forecast Updated : 6 hours ago | As cooler & much drier air move in today, it'll feel more like January than December. Dress in layers and have a sweater or coat handy in case the breeze adds too much of a bite to bear. Click and watch the forecast video for details. Forecast Taylor's Monday Evening First Alert Forecast Updated : 19 hours ago | Here comes the rain! Widespread showers and a few heavy downpours are expected this evening and overnight tonight. Temperatures will stay in the mid 50s this evening, but we’ll have much cooler air move in by the sunrise. We’ll wake up on Tuesday in the mid to upper 40s. Most of the rain will be gone shortly after the sunrise. Tuesday afternoon will be dry and breezy. We'll likely have more rain by the end of the week. Here's the latest forecast. Forecast Wesley's Monday Afternoon First Alert Forecast Updated : Dec. 1, 2025 at 11:12 AM CST | Eventually by tonight, plan on widespread rain showers across South MS. Then, turning drier & quite chilly tomorrow with a possible freeze tomorrow night. Click and watch the forecast video for details. title: Stronger Than Sung Jinwoo: Solo Leveling's New Strongest Character Is Finally Coming
snippet: Rei is an Editor for GameRant's Evergreen and Features teams from Kashmir, situated in Beirut. He's an avid fan of anime, manga, and gaming. He is the author of some of the articles here that you liked, and others that you didn't. When he isn't writing, he ...
content: Stronger Than Sung Jinwoo: Solo Leveling's New Strongest Character Is Finally Coming Menu Sign in now Close Game News Platforms Submenu PlayStation Xbox Nintendo PC Games Mobile GR Originals Submenu Opinions Game Reviews Features Game Rant Advance Game Guides Maps Videos Submenu Originals Game Trailers Anime Submenu News Features More Submenu Movies & TV Lists Giveaways Sign in Newsletter Menu Follow Followed Like Threads 1 More Action Summary Generate a summary of this story Sign in now Fallout 76: Burning Springs (Game Rant Advance) Where Winds Meet Black Ops 7 Arc Raiders Battlefield 6 Coming Soon Close Stronger Than Sung Jinwoo: Solo Leveling's New Strongest Character Is Finally Coming By Rei Penber Published Nov 7, 2025 Rei is an Editor for GameRant's Evergreen and Features teams from Kashmir, situated in Beirut. He's an avid fan of anime, manga, and gaming. He is the author of some of the articles here that you liked, and others that you didn't. When he isn't writing, he often re-reads One Piece, and replays his favorite games. Sign in to your Game Rant account Summary Generate a summary of this story follow Follow followed Followed Like Like Thread 1 Log in Here is a fact-based summary of the story contents: Try something different: Show me the facts Explain it like I’m 5 Give me a lighthearted recap This article contains spoilers from the Solo Leveling manhwa. Proceed with caution. Solo Leveling fans have received a ton of exciting content in the anime so far, and they're already craving more. In just about 25 episodes, Solo Leveling has created a very exciting cast of powerful Hunters and some other strong entities as well. That said, it doesn't come as a surprise to anyone to see that Solo Leveling is mostly focused on Sung Jinwoo's strength alone. At the moment, there aren't too many powerful characters in Solo Leveling , which might disappoint some fans. After all, without bigger obstacles in Jinwoo's path, it is difficult for fans to get excited about what's to come. Sung Jinwoo has dominated in Solo Leveling so far , and his biggest challenge so far was the Ant King , who fell easily to him as well. Related Solo Leveling Is Making A Comeback in November Solo Leveling is returning, and very soon. As early as November. Posts 3 By Rei Penber Nov 1, 2025 That said, things are about to get a lot harder for Sung Jinwoo in Solo Leveling as the new strongest will most likely be introduced very soon. So far in the story, fans have seen very little of the Monarchs, and even the concept isn't properly elaborated upon. In Solo Leveling Season 3 and beyond, this is going to change , and fans might even see a glimpse of the one who stands above them all, Antares . Fans of Solo Leveling will be ecstatic to meet this monster who will prove to be the ultimate enemy for Sung Jinwoo . Antares Is Stronger Than Sung Jinwoo Initially Antares' Debut is Coming In Solo Leveling Sung Jinwoo isn't that strong in the anime right now Antares is above his level Solo Leveling anime fans have yet to see the true strongest bunch in the series so far. Up until now, Solo Leveling has only focused on Sung Jinwoo and his development in terms of strength. Now, the series will take a drastic turn and focus more on character growth, and at the same time, bigger obstacles for Sung Jinwoo. Every time I get stronger, I feel like I lose a part of myself. — Sung Jinwoo, Solo Leveling The biggest of them all will be Antares, who could potentially be introduced in Solo Leveling Season 3 , depending on how many chapters it adapts. Chances are, Antares will appear in Solo Leveling Season 3 , at least for a bit. Related Solo Leveling Season 3 Could Kill The Anime Forever Solo Leveling season 3 has yet to even be confirmed. The long wait could kill the hype. Posts 5 By Rei Penber Oct 30, 2025 For those who don't know, Antares is officially the strongest Solo Leveling enemy that Sung Jinwoo faces in the original story. He is the Monarch of Destruction , also known

Since opening Juneberry Table (3900 Lorain Ave., 216-331-0338), the chef’s three-year-old breakfast-and-lunch diner in Ohio City, demand has always outpaced supply. Waits for a table in the charming bistro are common, especially on weekends, and the kitchen desperately needed more prep space. “We had the opportunity to take the next-door space over,” says Small. “We’ve always been in need of more space.” While Juneberry fans understandably might desire that newfound space be used for more seating, that arrangement isn’t feasible, Small explains. “We have a limitation to how many more tables we can handle because of our kitchen size,” she says. After giving the matter some thought, Small settled on a multi-purpose space that she is calling Juneberry To Go. The shop gives people waiting for a table next door a place to browse the shelves, stocked with products like retail wine, regional foodstuffs, and

title: Galaxi Brands Launches: A Next-Generation Marketplace Empowering Celebrities, Athletes, and Influencers to Create Their Own Products
snippet: LOS ANGELES, CA / ACCESS Newswire / November 4, 2025 / Galaxi Brands today announced the upcoming launch of its revolutionary creator-led marketplace, a full-service platform empowering celebrities, athletes, artists, and influencers to create and sell ...
content: Galaxi Brands Launches: A Next-Generation Marketplace Empowering Celebrities, Athletes, and Influencers to Create Their Own Products - The Hutchinson News The content on this page was provided by an independent third party and syndicated by XPR Media. Members of the editorial and news staff of the USA TODAY Network were not involved in the creation of this content. Galaxi Brands Launches: A Next-Generation Marketplace Empowering Celebrities, Athletes, and Influencers to Create Their Own Products Written by Biz Ventures LOS ANGELES, CA / ACCESS Newswire / November 4, 2025 / Galaxi Brands today announced the upcoming launch of its revolutionary creator-led marketplace, a full-service platform empowering celebrities, athletes, artists, and influencers to create and sell their own consumer products-starting with beverages. Officially launching in the first quarter of 2026 , Galaxi Brands is redefining how personal brands enter the consumer goods space by removing traditional barriers to entry and providing a turnkey solution from concept to shelf. Through its strategic partnership, Galaxi Brands offers creators the ability to develop, manufacture, and distribute their own beverage lines with minimal upfront costs. The company provides an end-to-end infrastructure – covering product formulation, packaging, compliance, production, logistics, and marketing – allowing talent to focus on storytelling and audience engagement while Galaxi handles the rest. “We’re building the future of creator commerce,” said a Galaxi Brands spokesperson. “For too long, launching a product meant millions in startup costs and years of development. Galaxi Brands changes that. We give creators the tools, expertise, and resources to turn their ideas into tangible brands-quickly, efficiently, and at scale.” By bridging the gap between influence and ownership , Galaxi Brands enables creators to transform their reach into real equity. From functional beverages and ready-to-drink products to limited-edition collaborations and lifestyle goods, Galaxi is setting the stage for a new era of celebrity-driven brand innovation. “We believe this is the way of the future,” added the spokesperson. “The next generation of brand empires will be built by creators who own their narratives, their audiences, and now-their products.” To learn more or to be a part of this creator-led launch , contact Natasha June at natashajune@mac.com or +1 (310) 926-1204 . About Galaxi Brands Galaxi Brands is a full-service marketplace and brand incubator empowering creators to build and launch their own consumer products. Partnering with leading manufacturers like Lone Star Brewery, Galaxi offers turnkey development, production, and distribution solutions for beverages and beyond-bringing celebrity-backed brands to life with minimal upfront investment. Galaxi Brands is a subsidiary of Biz Ventures , a diversified holding company focused on developing, funding, and scaling next-generation consumer, technology, and entertainment ventures that merge innovation with cultural influence. Biz Ventures provides strategic infrastructure, capital, and executive oversight to its portfolio companies to accelerate growth and long-term value creation. SOURCE: Biz Ventures View the original press release on ACCESS Newswire Information contained on this page is provided by an independent third-party content provider. XPRMedia and this Site make no warranties or representations in connection therewith.
